ECSchema.description: The Geotechnical Exploration schema contains classes that allow representation of subterranean exploration, such as boreholes.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:SpatialLocationElement that represents a portion or all of a geotechnical field and laboratory investigation.
A GeotechnicalInvestigationElement that is the parent of other GeotechnicalInvestigationElements.
A GeotechnicalInvestigationElement that represents an entire geotechnical field and laboratory investigation.

ECProperty.description: Distance east from iModel (geolocation) origin to the origin used in the investigation.
Distance north from iModel (geolocation) origin to the origin used in the investigation.
Distance vertically from iModel (geolocation) origin to the origin/datum used in the investigation.

ECEntityClass.description: The configuration for one or more GeoExp:GeotechnicalInvestigation.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a specific GeoExp:GeotechnicalInvestigation has a configuration of GeoExp:GeotechnicalInvestigationConfiguration.

ECEntityClass.description: A GeotechnicalInvestigationElement that represents a geotechnical exploration (most commonly a borehole) at a particular location (corresponds to AGS LOCA).

ECProperty.description: Distance east from reference grid origin to Exploration (corresponds to AGS LOCA_NATE)
Distance north from reference grid origin to Exploration (corresponds to AGS LOCA_NATN)
Elevation of surface earth's surface relative to datum at Exploration (corresponds to AGS LOCA_GL)
Latitude at Exploration (corresponds to AGS LOCA_LAT)
Longitude at Exploration (corresponds to AGS LOCA_LON)
Distance from the ground level to the bottom of the Exploration (corresponds to AGS LOCA_FDEP).
Date the Exploration was started (corresponds to AGS LOCA_STAR).
Date the Exploration was completed (corresponds to AGS LOCA_ENDD).
Remarks relating to this exploration. (corresponds to AGS LOCA_REM)

ECNavigationProperty.description: Reference to ExploratoryLocationStatus (corresponds to AGS LOCA_STAT)
Reference to ExploratoryLocationMethod (corresponds to AGS LOCA_TYPE)

ECEntityClass.description: A method value (such as cable percussion) for an ExploratoryLocation (instances correspond to AGS LOCA_TYPE values).

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a specific GeoExp:ExploratoryLocation has a method of GeoExp:ExploratoryLocationMethod (instances correspond to values of AGS LOCA_TYPE).

ECEntityClass.description: A status value for an ExploratoryLocation (instances correspond to AGS LOCA_STAT values).

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a specific GeoExp:Exploration has a status of GeoExp:ExplorationStatus (instances correspond to values of AGS LOCA_STAT).

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:SpatialLocationElement that represents information for depth range of an ExploratoryLocation (typically a borehole). Always a child of ExploratoryLocation.

ECProperty.description: Distance from ground surface to top of depth range.
Distance from ground surface to bottom of depth range.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:SpatialLocationElement that represents information for a single depth (not a range) of an ExploratoryLocation (typically a borehole). Always a child of ExploratoryLocation.

ECProperty.description: Distance from ground surface to observation.

ECEntityClass.description: A DepthRangeInformation that represents the orientation and inclination in a depth range of an ExploratoryLocation (corresponds to AGS HORN).

ECProperty.description: Orientation of exploratory hole section or traverse from north (corresponds to AGS HORN_ORNT)
Inclination of hole section or traverse measured positively down from horizontal (corresponds to AGS HORN_INCL)
Remarks relating to orientation and inclination of hole section. (corresponds to AGS HORN_REM)

ECEntityClass.description: A DepthRangeInformation that represents the geological description of the range provided at exploration time (corresponds to AGS GEOL).

ECProperty.description: General description of stratum. (corresponds to AGS GEOL_DESC)
Remarks (corresponds to AGS GEOL_REM)

ECNavigationProperty.description: Reference to LegendCode (corresponds to AGS GEOL_LEG)
Reference to GeologyCode (corresponds to AGS GEOL_GEOL)
Reference to AlternateGeologyCode (corresponds to AGS GEOL_GEO2)

ECEntityClass.description: A legend code for use with FieldGeologicalDescription (instances correspond to AGS GEOL_LEG values).

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a specific GeoExp:FieldGeologicalDescription has a legend code of GeoExp:LegendCode (instances correspond to values of AGS GEO_LEG).

ECEntityClass.description: A custom geologic classification code for use with FieldGeologicalDescription (instances correspond to AGS GEOL_GEOL values).

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a specific GeoExp:FieldGeologicalDescription has a geology code of GeoExp:GeologyCode.

ECEntityClass.description: An alternate custom geologic classification code for use with FieldGeologicalDescription (instances correspond to AGS GEOL_GEO2 values).

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a specific GeoExp:FieldGeologicalDescription has an alternate geology code of GeoExp:AlternateGeologyCode.

ECEntityClass.description: A DepthRangeInformation that represents the drilling (or more generally excavation) method over a depth range (corresponds to AGS HDPH).

ECProperty.description: Date and time the method was started (in this range) (corresponds to AGS HDPH_STAR).
Date and time the method was stopped (in this range) (corresponds to AGS HDPH_ENDD).

ECNavigationProperty.description: Reference to Method (corresponds to AGS HDPH_TYPE)

ECEntityClass.description: A custom excavation method for use with MethodByDepth (instances correspond to AGS HDPH_TYPE values).

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a specific GeoExp:MethodByDepth has a method of GeoExp:Method.

ECEntityClass.description: A DepthInformation that represents the border between saturated and unsaturated soil (corresponds to AGS WSTG).

ECProperty.description: Date and time of striking water (corresponds to AGS WSTG_DTIM).
Remarks (corresponds to AGS WSTG_REM)

ECEntityClass.description: An descriptive relative time (not a literal time) for use with WaterStrike (no AGS correspondence).

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a specific GeoExp:WaterStrike was observed at GeoExp:WaterStrikeObservationTime.
